command 401: when buildingThe bottom layer is for all tiles which 
command 401: are to be seen on the bottom.
command 101: \Name[???]\P[1]The middle layer is for things on top 
command 401: of that, but may still have something else covering it. 
command 101: \Name[???]\P[1]The top layer is for things 
command 401: covering the middle layer tiles.

command 401: there is also an event layer for tiles even on top of 
command 401: those ones.

command 401: their appearence.

command 401: Character is able to go under or over a tile is defined 
command 401: in the tileset.

command 401: given a * star rating, which will determine its priority.

command 401: snowed. Everyone was happy.

command 401: the secrets of time and space.

command 401: sacrifice something precious and 
command 401: irreplacable.

command 101: World weary and jaded by their years, 
command 401: Jikan did not find it hard to cast it aside. 
command 401: Nothing would stand in the way of their 
command 401: goal, not even themself.
command 101: The process was quick and painless.
command 401: Stripped of their tempority, Jikan was 
command 401: empty enough to house the forces of 
command 401: the cosmos within them.

command 401: would be spared from their influence.

command 401: placed upon the fabric of the stars had 
command 401: brought forth the end of days. It would 
command 401: not be long before the world fell apart.
command 101: However, not all was lost. Jikan's 
command 401: tempority had managed to persist apart 
command 401: from them, and had been leading a long 
command 401: winded rebellion against the them.
command 101: Just as Jikan had went back to the 
command 401: beginning to establish rule, their tempority 
command 401: had also went back to the beginning, but 
command 401: for a more wholesome reason.
command 101: Jikan's tempority had made it their mission 
command 401: to protect all of tempority from their wrath.
command 401: The people of time lived for the sake of 
command 401: their protector in secret.
command 101: The time they had upon that world was 
command 401: numbered. Jikan's tempority knew they
